Summary: Bright sphere of light in the northern sky passing east to west
trends: There have been no other sightings in Salt Lick
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailslast night around 10:30 or so, i had taken our dog out. as normal, i stood on the porch and tried to count the number of planes that i could see in the sky (we recently moved to this location where there is a very good view of the sky in several directions compared to where we had lived and you could only see the sky immediately overhead)...it struck me as odd that i couldn't see any this time. then i looked to the north-east and notice a bright light that i at first thought was a low-flying plane...i wasn't able to get a good view at that time as it was being blocked by trees. after it came out from behind the tree line, i noticed that i was now looking at it from a side angle and the light was just as intese from this direction. i watched it continue it trek toward the west until it was behind the house. at that point, i went into the back-yard and continue to watch it. i called for my wife to verify that i was seeing something out of the norm. now, the view was the rear of the "craft" (for lack of better word), and again, the light intensity was the same. i continued to watch it until it was out of site. afterwards the realization of what just occured hit me and i realized that not once did i see any of the required strobe lights, nor, did i hear any sound either from a plane and\or a helicoptor. i also noticed that at no point during this did i see any other planes around. it was just surreal. several moments after it passed out of sight, i then noticed that there were 3 or 4 planes flying through, all of which were easily identified as a plane because even though they were definately flying at a higher altitude, but, you could clearly make out the red and blue strobing lights. i have spoken to a good friend of mine who stated that it could have been the space station, but, this appeared to be much closer...at this point, i have no clue what i saw. i remain somewhat skeptical, but, i guess what i saw was a ufo in it's truest sense in the fact that i can identify what it was.
